item.title: Flyposter on road furniture at junction, 26th August
item.description:
There is a flyposter at the junction of Hewlett Rd and the A435, at the traffic lights. It reads something like 'Hazard Crystal Clear.....'. It's on the left as you're turning out of Berkely St.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1a, London Road, Fairview, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flyposter on pavement, 26th August
item.description:
A flyposter has been put up at the junction between Winstonian Rad and St Luke's. It says something like 'Haus Installations' and there is one further down Winstonian Rd, on the left after Victoria Place, at the corner where Winstonian Rd bends to the right.So, two flyposters in total at least.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 42, All Saints' Road, Fairview, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broken glass under circular baby swing in play area in Greyhound Gardens, 26th August
item.description:
Glass is there as at 0935 hours 26/8/25, unknown how long it has been there - mainly on matting underneath swings but also on grass near matting
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Greyhound Gardens, Elmbridge, Gloucester

item.title: Pavement sunk and now trip hazard, 26th August
item.description:
The driveway of 5 Alderton Road, Benhall has been sinking for a while and is now a trip hazard for anyone using the drive

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 7, Alderton Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Not exactly a pothole but once again another area along this particular road with a traffic calming area where the bricks are loose and flying up., 26th August
item.description:
Along the main drag Stearman Walk Coopers Edge Brockworth Gloucester, by the bus stop on the left coming from Lobleys Drive. This is the second area affected.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lobleys Drive, Hucclecote, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
